login_page_active.label: Show social icons on login page

checkout_page_active.label: Show social icons on checkout page

sharing.label: Enable
sharing.comment: Share buttons will be displayed on product page.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Enable registration and authorization with Vkontakte social network.
Important! Fields: "Application ID" and "Secure key" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Vkontakte.

key.label: Application ID
key.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: https://vk.com/editapp?act=create

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.comment: Display icons in a predetermined order.

notify.label: Special notes
notify.comment: You can enter a note here, for example which e-mail was used to create the application and other necessary data.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Enable registration and authorization with Facebook social network.
Important! Fields: "App ID" and "App Secret" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Facebook.

key.label: App ID
key.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: https://developers.facebook.com/

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.comment: Display icons in a predetermined order.

notify.label: Special notes
notify.comment: You can enter a note here, for example which e-mail was used to create the application and other necessary data.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Enable registration and authorization with Google+ social network.
Important! Fields: "Client ID" and "Client secret" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Google+.

secret.label: Client secret
secret.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: https://code.google.com/apis/console

callback.label: Authorized redirect URIs
callback.comment: Данную ссылку(ссылки) понадобится указать в настройках при создании приложения.

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.comment: Display icons in a predetermined order.

notify.label: Special notes
notify.comment: You can enter a note here, for example which e-mail was used to create the application and other necessary data.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Enable registration and authorization with Odnoklassniki social network.
Important! Fields: "Application ID", "Secret key" and "Public key" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Odnoklassniki.

key.label: Application ID
key.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: http://ok.ru

callback.label: Redirect uri
callback.comment: Данную ссылку(ссылки) понадобится указать в настройках при создании приложения.

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.comment: Display icons in a predetermined order.

notify.label: Special notes
notify.comment: You can enter a note here, for example which e-mail was used to create the application and other necessary data.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Enable registration and authorization with Yandex social network.
Important! Fields: "Application ID" and "Password" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Yandex.

key.label: Application ID
key.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: https://oauth.yandex.ru/client/new

callback.label: Callback URL
callback.comment: Данную ссылку(ссылки) понадобится указать в настройках при создании приложения.

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.comment: Display icons in a predetermined order.

notify.label: Special notes
notify.comment: You can enter a note here, for example which e-mail was used to create the application and other necessary data.

Important! Fields: "Application ID" and "Secret key" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Mail.Ru.

key.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: http://api.mail.ru/sites/my/add/

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Enable registration and authorization with Twitter social network.
Important! Fields: "Consumer Key (API Key)" and "Consumer Secret (API Secret)" must be filled, to enable icon for registration/authorization with Twitter.

key.comment: If you don't have a key, create an application on social network page: https://apps.twitter.com/

callback.label: Callback URL
callback.comment: Данную ссылку(ссылки) понадобится указать в настройках при создании приложения.
